track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description: Join April World CodeSprint to prove your coding skills, win $15,000 in prizes and get discovered by companies. Beginning April 29th @ 9am PST, developers from around the world will have 24 hours to solve 8 CodeChallenges.
primary_contest.name: World Codesprint April
